message:
Hey everyone! This has nothing to do with Jesus and everything to do with a statistics class I am taking but we are collecting data based on majors and handedness. I was trying to think of a place that I could post my group's survey and thought of this loving and wonderful bunch of people. It would really mean a lot if you could take 5 minutes out of your day to answer these 6 questions! Just ask yourselves, WWJD? :P

Disclaimer: Answering these questions is completely anonymous and optional. We are not collecting anyone's names or personal information. It is purely for a school project and will not be published. Once we turn in our project we are destroying all of our data too. :) 

Thank you so much everyone!! (Sorry for the spam) 

Here's the link:
